abstract_summ: 104 adult patients with sepsis were admitted to ICU from Jan 2015 to Aug 2016 . SAE group showed a significantly higher APACHE II score, SOFA scores, length of ICU stay, 28-day and 180-day mortality . S100B levels on day 1 and 3 after ICU admission were diagnostic for SAE with 80.0% specificity and 66.1% sensitivity .
